Polres Pelalawan Tangkap Pelaku Karhutla di Riau
05 Nov 2019, 09:35 by Chaidir Anwar Tanjung
Pekanbaru - Polres Pelalawan di Riau menangkap satu pelaku pembakaran hutan dan lahan (Karhutla). Penangkapan bermula ketika tersangka membakar sarang tawon yang apinya menjalar membakar lahan.
"Tersangka atas nama Helmizal warga Kelurahan Ukui, Kecamatan Ukui, Pelalawan. Barang bukti yang kita amankan ada korek api, parang dan potongan kayu sisa dibakar," kata Kasat Reskrim Polres Pelalawan, AKP Teddy Ardian kepada detikcom, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Tenddy menjelaskan, kebakaran lahan ini terjadi di areal perusahaan hutan tanaman industri yang dikuasai masyarakat. Kebakaran ini terjadi pada 29 Oktober 2019 lalu.
"Kebakaran diketahui oleh tim patroli perusahaan yang menerima laporan adanya lahan yang terbakar di lokasi yang diokupasi masyarakat," kata Teddy.
Atas laporan tersebut, lanjut Teddy, tim langsung menuju ke lokasi untuk melakukan pemadaman. Saat tiba di lokasi, pelaku terlihat juga berusaha untuk memadamkan lahan yang terbakar.
"Luas lahan yang terbakar 1,14 hektare. Api ini merembet dari lahan milik pelaku," kata Teddy.

Pelalawan District Police Arrests Forestry and Forestry Actors in Riau
05 Nov 2019, 09:35 by Chaidir Anwar Tanjung
Pekanbaru - Pelalawan Regional Police in Riau arrested one perpetrator of forest and land burning (Karhutla). The arrest began when the suspect set fire to the wasps' nests which spread the fire burning land.
"The suspect on behalf of Helmizal, resident of Ukui Village, Ukui District, Pelalawan. The evidence that we have secured is lighters, machetes and leftover pieces of wood burned," Kasal Reskrim Pelalawan Police, AKP Teddy Ardian told AFP on Tuesday (11/5/2019) ).
Tenddy explained, this land fire occurred in the area of industrial forest plantations controlled by the community. This fire occurred on October 29, 2019 ago.
"The fire was discovered by the company's patrol team who received a report of the burning of land in a location occupied by the community," Teddy said.
Upon the report, Teddy continued, the team went straight to the location to conduct a blackout. When arrived at the location, the perpetrators were also seen trying to extinguish the burned land.
"The area of the burned land was 1.14 hectares. This fire spread from the land owned by the perpetrators," Teddy said.
